1525166833_1KCJ86Jg3LNBpHxcaRojsHTg9Qme9.body: installing an older version of OS X, anything before Snow Leopard on a different partition and installing Rosetta would work for most PPC OS X applications, however diablo 1 predates osx, and would require "classic mode", which only on 10.4 and below, and only for PPCs.  best bet would be parallels and windows IMO
